RAM BEER SINGH
Cont.: +1-505-677-0910, LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/ram-beer-s-480405179
SUMMARY
•17 years of solid IT expertise in software design, architecting, optimizing, gathering requirements, analyzing, 
reviewing,  and  documenting,  across  the  SDLC.  Hands-on  experience  with  cloud  applications,  migration, 
mobile native and hybrid apps, internet of things (IoT), and online applications.
•A multi-skilled enterprise and solutions architect with an emphasis on architecture strategy and roadmap for 
the organization's spectrum of business capabilities.
•Effectively collaborated with corporate clients and offered solutions to satisfy needs while taking an enterprise 
roadmap  into  account.  developed  POC  utilizing  a  variety  of  technologies  and  provided  business  with 
demonstrations. 
•Proven expertise in providing solution design by considering the present and future states of all systems while 
working on various projects.

demonstrations. 
•Proven expertise in providing solution design by considering the present and future states of all systems while 
working on various projects.
•Strong knowledge of enterprise architecture, including TOGAF, Zachman, and COBIT, as well as proficiency 
in building scalable and highly effective systems.
•Strictly  adhering  to  architecture  concepts  including  scalability,  performance,  agility,  and  loosely  connected 
architecture.
•Extensive hands-on expertise using AWS, Azure, and Google cloud services for more than seven years, as 
well  as  designing  enterprise-level  systems.  Expertise  of  cloud  migrations  from  on-premises  to  private  and 
multiple  clouds.  Also,  expertise  designing  micro  services  and  distributed  applications  using  Kubernetes, 
containers, and/or serverless technology including SOA, object-oriented analysis, and design patterns.

containers, and/or serverless technology including SOA, object-oriented analysis, and design patterns.
•I have a very good knowledge of implementing SSO, MFA and other third-party tools like AWS Cognito, Azure 
AD, Google, Facebook, WSO2, Service Now, Salesforce, Apigee Gateway, Data Dog, Zustand, Google SSO 
etc. Excellent using Implement strategy for mitigation of code-vulnerabilities OWASP, SOC compliance.
•Give development and architectural teams thought leadership on DevOps/DevSecOps. Find security flaws in 
numerous  programs  and  suggest  fixes.  knowledge  of  managing  data  security  across  applications  and 
communication routes. Maintaining an automated mindset by leveraging Azure DevOps, open-source Jenkins, 
GitHub, code commit, code deploy, Docker, Kubernetes, ACR. 
•Aid in developing a repeatable process for creating and managing DevOps pipelines like Azure pipeline, yaml, 
terraforms. Create concepts for DevSecOps, providing environments on demand, and testing.

terraforms. Create concepts for DevSecOps, providing environments on demand, and testing.
•Strong development experience with .Net, C#, ASP.Net, Python, React Native, Xamarin, Dart, NodeJS, Obj-
C, Swift, Angular, and other cross-platform tool for mobile, and IoT.
•Practical experience in using third party tools like Redux, Flux, Zustand, Fortify, SonarQube, SonarCloud, 
Junit, including various development methodologies agile, scrum, waterfall etc. 
•Fix  production  release  problems  involving  business  and  IT  teams,  as  well  as  bigger  strategic  or  systemic 
problems  that  are  causing  inefficiencies  or  impeding  development.   Evaluation,  advice,  and  design  of

Cont.: +1-505-677-0910, LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/ram-beer-s-480405179

•Demonstrated  technical  proficiency  and  the  ability  to  pick  up  and  use  new  technologies  as  they  emerge 
quickly.  Excellent  communication  and  interpersonal  skills,  drive  for  success,  and  capacity  to  overcome 
obstacles.
